pages.text: Enchantments and your Color Magic have a lot in common. That's why you weren't surprised when your first attempt to combine [#](bb00bb)Enchanted Books[#]() with [Pigment](entry://general/pigment) was an instant success.\\Placing an [#](bb00bb)Enchanted Book[#]() onto the [Enchanter](entry://enchanting/enchanter), surrounding it with matching [Pigment](entry://general/pigment) and supplying a steady stream of experience increases your books level.
Just try not to interrupt said process, otherwise it will stop entirely.
